name: Time Strike Free: Accurate at Speed
name_original: Time Strike Free: Accurate at Speed
description:
Striker: A Striker is a circle with a hole, used to bounce & clear the Orange Circles.
Orange Circles: These are target to hit. They will auto increase in size after 5 seconds after hitting. Each Orange Circle will have its own clock time, displayed on it.

Game Play:
1. Time starts; clear all Orange Circles at fast rate.
2. Shoot the striker by pulling it back like a balance power slingshot and release in any angle.
3. The striker shot speed depends on how much you pulled the striker back.
4. Unique part is that each ball have timer of 20 secs. When striker hits a big ball it reduce in four steps

Game Features:
- Simple yet addictive awesome brain game indeed
- Full Orange color beautiful theme Environment
- Simple physics sports active puzzle game
- Easy user friendly menu navigation
